document.full_text: robert stempel, the first engineer to become the chief executive of general motors co , died on saturday in florida, the detroit free press reported. he was 77.
document.title: former gm ceo stempel dies at age 77: report
lines_and_colors: robert stempel, the first engineer to become the chief executive of general motors co , died on saturday in florida, the detroit free press reported. he was 77.
